name: Ralabs
description:
The main goal of Ralabs is to transform your businesses digitally. By providing expert software engineering and consultancy services, we make our clients succeed, increase market share, reduce costs, increase revenues.
For the last 5 years, we have been providing our clients with a full range of software services. These include dedicated teams, product design and development, R&D & technology consulting!
 
Ralabs expertise
React/Redux, React Native, Next.js.
Angularjs, Angular, RxJS, Ionic.
Nodejs, Express, Koa, LoopBack.
Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Sinatra.
Python, Django, Flask, Tornado.
PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Cassandra, Influx.
TensorFlow, NumPy, Pandas, Hadoop, Snowflake, Airflow, Kafka.
AWS, Microsoft Azure, Docker, Kubernetes.
Product Design, Graphic Design, UX/UI Design, Architectural Design.
 
Contact us here - (https://ralabs.org/contact-us/)!
